name: Find the exit (Nikita_zav)
description:
This game was created for Game Jam "The Completion Jam". 

This is an easy puzzle, in which your task is to reach the exit in the end of every level. But you will meet lots of enemies. They can kill you whis ease, so, you shouldn't contact them, you should use different traps to kill them. And remember, you must be out of enemies' place.
